mission.title: Mission
mission.content: At Awaken, our mission is to make coding education accessible and inclusive for all learners, especially in underrepresented communities. Through innovative tools like Padma, we empower students and educators to embrace computational thinking and problem-solving in their native languages.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: We envision a world where everyone, regardless of their background, has the opportunity to learn programming in a way that is intuitive, culturally relevant, and accessible offline. By fostering creativity through our Padma coding tool, we aim to nurture the next generation of innovators.
